participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: outgoing and adventurous, loves the thrill of country music concerts
participant_1.background: i like to go to country concerts on weekends. i own two vintage mustangs. my favorite music is country. i've two dogs.

participant_2.name: Sophia

participant_2.background: i am fluent in english spanish and french. i am an elementary school teacher. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures.

content.text: i am not really a big fan of animals .
